contextId.information: This can be translated with a verbal phrase. AT: "the ministry of reconciling people to him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
This noun "obedience" can be stated with a verb, "obey." AT: "how all of you obeyed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: the obedience of all of you

contextId.information: This can be translated with verbal phrases. AT: "because he feels guilty or someone is compelling him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])

The word "humility" and "gentleness" are abstract nouns, and can be expressed in another way. AT: "I am humble and gentle as I do so, because Christ has made me that way" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: by the humility and gentleness of Christ
